companyName: Invesco FTSE RAFI Developed Markets ex-U.S. Small-Mid
description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the FTSE RAFI Developed ex U.S. Mid-Small 1500 Index (the "underlying index").
 The fund will invest at least 90% of its total assets in securities of small-and mid-capitalization companies that are classified as "developed" within the country classification definition of FTSE International Limited ("FTSE"), excluding the United States, and that comprise the underlying index, as well as American depositary receipts ("ADRs") and global depositary receipts ("GDRs") that are based on the securities in the underlying index.
